adDetails: Hi. I'm native Korean from Seoul I was a private tutor for high school students in Korea and I've been teaching Korean for foreign friends here (American,Japanese,Chinese,Korean-American..) I'm an experienced teacher who speak standard Korean, I've gotten a lot of positive feedback from my students. : ) Above all, I love teaching, I can offer lower tutoring fee and guarantee kind,sincere and well-prepared teaching for all levels. I will also help you whenever you have questions about anything related to Korean such as lyrics,drama script,articles.. through Skype,messenger,etc.. I'm so confident that you'll enjoy and benefit from my lesson -- Get free trial first then decide : ) -- * From basic to advanced level * Location - San Jose area * Fee - 1 hour = 25 $ , 1.5 hours = 35 $ , 2 hours = 45 $ Please feel free to ask any questions, every condition is flexible Thanks for reading : )
